forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 8am and 3pm, then a slight chance of rain. Cloudy, with a high near 39. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 8pm, then a slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 8am, then a slight chance of snow showers between 8am and 11am, then a slight chance of rain showers between 11am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. Northeast wind 0 to 10 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
